tool_description: An API that allows you to beable to interract with binance including getting price data, trades data, order book data, candle stick data and many more
name: Binance-API
title: Binance-API

api_list.name: top long short account ratio
api_list.description:
Returns the top long to short account ratio

If **startTime** and **endTime** are not sent, the most recent data is returned.

required_parameters.name: pair
required_parameters.description: e.g bnbusdt or BNBUSDT. Cases insensitive

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: number value of the limit of number of stats to be returned (default=30, max=500)

api_list.name: candle stick
api_list.description:
Allows you to get information about one or many candle sticks

Valid **Intervals** are ["1m", "3m", "5m", "15m", "30m", "1h", "2h", "4h", "6h", "8h", "12h", "1d", "3d", "1w", "1M"]

required_parameters.name: pair
required_parameters.description: e.g bnbusdt or BNBUSDT. Cases insensitive

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: number value of the limit of number of canldles to be returned (default=500, max=1500)

api_list.name: market order book
api_list.description:
Returns the most recent trades in order book for the market pair provided

Limits that are set must be among these [5, 10, 20, 50, 100, 500, 1000]

For each element in the bids/asks response (See example response)
[
          "19952.90",  #price
          "15.393"        #quantity
]
**E** is the message output time
**T** is the transaction time

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
number value of the limit of number of trades to be returned (default=500)
Value must be among these [5, 10, 20, 50, 100, 500, 1000]

api_list.name: top long short position ratio
api_list.description:
Returns the top long to short positions ratio

If **startTime** and **endTime** are not sent, the most recent data is returned.

required_parameters.name: pair
required_parameters.description: e.g bnbusdt or BNBUSDT. Case insensitive

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: number value of the limit of number of stats to be returned (default=30, max=500)

api_list.name: contract candlestick
api_list.description:
Get candle sticks from a particular contract

**contract** types are PERPETUAL, CURRENT_QUARTER and NEXT_QUARTER
Valid **Intervals** are ["1m", "3m", "5m", "15m", "30m", "1h", "2h", "4h", "6h", "8h", "12h", "1d", "3d", "1w", "1M"]

required_parameters.name: contract
required_parameters.description: The type of contract to interact with

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: number value of the limit of number of candles to be returned (default=500, max=1500)

api_list.name: funding rate history
api_list.description:
Returns funding rate history


**endTime** is a timestamp in ms
**limit** is the number of candle sticks to get (default=500)

If no **pair** is provided, it returns all current funding rates.
If **startTime** and **endTime **are not sent, the most recent limit data are returned.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: number value of the limit of number of pairs to be returned (default=100, max=1000)

optional_parameters.name: pair
optional_parameters.description: e.g bnbusdt or BNBUSDT. Cases insensitive

api_list.name: mark price candlestick
api_list.description:
Returns the mark price candle sticks for the specified pairs

Valid **intervals** are ["1m", "3m", "5m", "15m", "30m", "1h", "2h", "4h", "6h", "8h", "12h", "1d", "3d", "1w", "1M"]

If startTime and endTime are not sent, the most recent candle sticks are returned

required_parameters.name: pair
required_parameters.description: e.g bnbusdt or BNBUSDT. Cases insensitive

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: number value of the limit of number of pairs to be returned (default=100, max=1000)

api_list.name: 24 hr stats
api_list.description:
24 hour rolling window price change statistics.
Be Careful when accessing this with no **pair**.

optional_parameters.name: pair
optional_parameters.description: e.g bnbusdt or BNBUSDT. Cases insensitive

api_list.name: recent trades
api_list.description:
Returns the most recent trades of a particular pair

Set **limit** as a query parameter to specify the number of trades to get (default=500, max=1000).

required_parameters.name: pair
required_parameters.description: e.g bnbusdt or BNBUSDT. Cases insensitive

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: number value of the limit of number of trades to be returned (default=100, max=1000)

api_list.name: open interest
api_list.description: Returns present open interest of a specific pair.

required_parameters.name: pair
required_parameters.description: e.g bnbusdt or BNBUSDT. Case insensitive

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://binance-api8.p.rapidapi.com/open-interest/bnbusdt"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "binance-api8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://binance-api8.p.rapidapi.com/open-interest/{pair}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "binance-api8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: exchange info
api_list.description: Returns the rules of Binance exchange
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://binance-api8.p.rapidapi.com/exchange-info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "binance-api8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://binance-api8.p.rapidapi.com/exchange-info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "binance-api8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: index info
api_list.description:
Returns Index info of a **pair**

If a **pair** is not provided, index info for all the pairs will be returned

optional_parameters.name: pair
optional_parameters.description: e.g bnbusdt or BNBUSDT. Case insensitive

api_list.name: order book
api_list.description:
Returns the order book of the **pair** provided.

If no pair is provided, order books of all pairs will be returned in an array.

optional_parameters.name: pair
optional_parameters.description: e.g bnbusdt or BNBUSDT. Cases insensitive

api_list.name: taker long short ratio
api_list.description:
Returns takers long to short positions ratio

If **startTime** and **endTime** are not sent, the most recent data is returned.
Only the data of the latest 30 days is available.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: number value of the limit of number of stats to be returned (default=30, max=500)

api_list.name: global long short account ratio
api_list.description:
Returns the global long to short account ratio

If **startTime** and **endTime** are not sent, the most recent data is returned.

required_parameters.name: pair
required_parameters.description: e.g bnbusdt or BNBUSDT. Case insensitive

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: number value of the limit of number of stats to be returned (default=30, max=500)

api_list.name: asset index
api_list.description:
Returns asset index for Multi-Assets mode

If no **pair** is provided, it returns data for all the pairs

optional_parameters.name: pair
optional_parameters.description: e.g AUDUSD or audusd. Case insensitive

api_list.name: blvt nav candlestick
api_list.description:
The BLVT NAV system is based on Binance Futures
Returns  LVT candlesticks

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The limit of number of candles to be returned (default=500, max=1000)

api_list.name: open interest stats
api_list.description:
Returns open interest statistics with the period provided

If **startTime** and **endTime** are not sent, the most recent data is returned.
Only the data of the latest 30 days is available.

required_parameters.name: pair
required_parameters.description: e.g bnbusdt or BNBUSDT. Cases insensitive

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: number value of the limit of number of stats to be returned (default=30, max=500)

api_list.name: premium index
api_list.description:
Returns the preimum index and funding rate of a pair
If no pair is given, it returns the premium indexes and funding rates of all the pairs

optional_parameters.name: pair
optional_parameters.description: e.g bnbusdt or BNBUSDT. Cases insensitive

api_list.name: Index price candle stick
api_list.description:
Returns the index price candle sticks of the specified pair

Valid **Intervals** are ["1m", "3m", "5m", "15m", "30m", "1h", "2h", "4h", "6h", "8h", "12h", "1d", "3d", "1w", "1M"]

required_parameters.name: pair
required_parameters.description: e.g bnbusdt or BNBUSDT. Cases insensitive

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: number value of the limit of number of pairs to be returned (default=500, max=1500)

api_list.name: price
api_list.description:
Returns the price of an asset

If no **pair** is provided, prices for all symbols will be returned in an array.

optional_parameters.name: pair
optional_parameters.description: e.g bnbusdt or BNBUSDT. Cases insensitive

api_list.name: server time
api_list.description:
Returns current time on the server.
Also used to check if you are connected too the API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://binance-api8.p.rapidapi.com/server-time"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "binance-api8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://binance-api8.p.rapidapi.com/server-time"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "binance-api8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
